com.github.i49.hibiscus.problems

Interface ProblemDescriber<V extends JsonValue>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of JsonValue which caused the problem.
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ProblemDescriber<V extends JsonValue>
    A helper interface to describe a problem for specified locale.

    This interface is used with AssertionFailureProblem class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String describe(V value, Locale locale)
      Describes a problem for specified locale.

    • Method Detail

      • describe

        String describe(V value,
                Locale locale)
        Describes a problem for specified locale.
        Parameters:
        value - the value in JSON document which caused the problem.
        locale - the locale for which a description is desired.
        Returns:
        a description of a problem.
